document_data.name: Ropes for All Uses
document_data.source: [[City of Delights|City of Delights (Gem of Zakhara)]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Ropes for All Uses''' was a shop located in the [[Grand Bazaar]] of [[Huzuz]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Activities:
Ropes for All Uses carried an assortment of standard [[rope]]s, both practical and ornamental.

One specialty rope carried by the shop made it much more difficult to escape from if the rope was used as binding. [[Focran Samina]] made these ropes himself and only had three in the store for sale at any given time. They usually sold for double the asking price.
document_data.Inhabitants: Focran owned and operated this establishment.
